actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Gorton. With written report No. 97-427.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Regular Orders. Calendar No. 609.

official_title: An original bill to extend the Safe Drinking Water Act, as amended, for one year.

summary.text: Amends the Public Health Service Act to revise specified provisions under the Safe Drinking Water Act. Provides that certifications of need or orders issued to assure availability of adequate supplies of chemicals necessary for water treatment may remain in effect until September 30, 1983 (currently September 30, 1982) or for one year after issuance, whichever occurs first. Extends through FY 1983 the authorizations of appropriations under the Safe Drinking Water Act for research, technical assistance, information, training of personnel, and grants to State programs of public water system supervision and of underground water source protection. Authorizes appropriations for FY 1983 for matching grants to States for the development of groundwater protection plans for sole source aquifer regions.

titles.title: An original bill to extend the Safe Drinking Water Act, as amended, for one year.
